statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE email='john.doe@example.com';
SELECT last_name, address FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, date_of_birth, address FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, last_name, address FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT email, full_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_profiles.username, user_attributes.attribute_key FROM user_profiles JOIN user_attributes ON user_profiles.user_id = user_attributes.user_id;

SELECT user_profiles.username, user_profiles.email, user_attributes.attribute_key FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN user_attributes ON user_profiles.user_id = user_attributes.user_id WHERE user_attributes.attribute_key = 'location';

SELECT user_profiles.username, user_profiles.email, user_attributes.attribute_key, user_attributes.attribute_value FROM user_profiles JOIN user_attributes ON user_profiles.user_id = user_attributes.user_id WHERE user_attributes.attribute_value != 'Developer';
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_attributes WHERE attribute_name = 'location';
SELECT id, attribute_name, attribute_value FROM user_attributes WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT session_id, session_token FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM user_profiles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_attributes WHERE attribute_name = 'age';
SELECT session_id, session_token FROM user_sessions WHERE expiration_time > NOW();
SELECT u.username, a.attribute_name, s.session_token FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_attributes a ON u.id = a.user_id JOIN user_sessions s ON u.id = s.user_id WHERE u.id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM profiles WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT user_id, attribute_key, attribute_value FROM attributes WHERE user_id = 2002 AND attribute_key = 'role';
SELECT * FROM UserProfile;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfile WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM UserProfile ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserAttributes WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, connection_user_id, connection_timestamp FROM UserConnections WHERE connection_type = 'friend' ORDER BY connection_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfile;
SELECT user_id, attribute_name, attribute_value FROM UserAttributes WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM UserActivity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM UserRoles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name FROM UserProfile u INNER JOIN UserRoles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
